description.value:
Gilded Icons hanging on armour or belts. Can be Icons of Inspiration (+3 to Command Tests), Wings of Wrath (+1 Damage to Charge Attacks), or Purity Focus (Reduce Gained Corruption by 1, min 1).

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Blood Angels

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
